instructions.gameDesign: This game needs to be highly addictive and anti-stress. Create a visually appealing, responsive, and engaging experience.
principles: Progressive rewards: Change object shapes, colors, and effects based on click count milestones
Visual feedback: Every interaction should have satisfying visual and animation responses
Anti-stress elements: Smooth animations, pleasing color schemes, and particle effects
Achievement system: Celebrate player progress with milestone notifications
Responsive design: The game should be playable and visually appealing on all device sizes
instructions.visualStyle: Modern, sleek UI with glass-morphism effects, dynamic lighting, and animated elements
instructions.playerExperience: Players should feel a sense of progress and achievement as they continue clicking, with new visual rewards encouraging continued engagement
